lyrics:
3 contributorsfeels so right lyricsverse 1
whisper to me softly
breathe words upon my skin
no ones near and listening
so please dont say goodbye

chorus
just hold me close and love me
press your lips to mine
mmm feels so right feels so right

verse 2
lying here beside you
i hear the echoes of your sighs
promise me youll stay with me
and keep me warm tonight

chorus
just hold me close and love me
give my heart a smile
mmm feels so right feels so right

verse 3
your body feels so gentle
and my passion rises high
youre loving me so easy
your wish is my command
see alabama liveget tickets as low as 58you might also likechorus
just hold me close and love me
tell me it wont end
mmm feels so right feels so right
feels so right

outro
oh how you feel so right babyembed
